text: The LIX Legislature of the Congress of Mexico met from September 2003 to August 2006. All members of the lower house (Chamber of Deputies) of the Congress were elected in the elections of July 2003 while members of the upper house (Senate) were elected in the elections of July 2000. ==Composition== ===Chamber of Deputies=== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#cccccc" align="center" valign="bottom" ! colspan=2| Party ! Members !
